readable.title: 485357535_b45ba5b6da
readable.content: A boy in a black and white shirt holds a red skateboard as he stands over the Hollywood Stars . A skateboarder examines the Hollywood Walk of Fame . A teenage boy wearing a striped shirt walks on a street paved with stars carrying a skateboard . Man walking with red skateboard . Person wearing black and white striped shirt holding a red skateboard standing on sidewalk with stars .
